ai-atk-s0403a15:2_1: They’re unable to enter the first path with regards to skillful qualities. They can’t enter the sure path with regards to skillful qualities.

ai-atk-s0403a15:5_0: Third: In the Land of the World
ai-atk-s0403a15:6_1: and third time, after listening to the Dhamma, it is the third belief of delivering, having heard the Dhamma’s special qualities,
ai-atk-s0403a15:6_2: fault-finding mind with a fault-finding mind.
ai-atk-s0403a15:6_3: I was seeking the virtues of delight, who seek the special qualities of virtue,
ai-atk-s0403a15:8_1: They don’t listen to the teachings, memorize them, and remember their level.
ai-atk-s0403a15:8_2: They don’t learn the Dhamma, wielding like a call.

ai-atk-s0403a15:10_1: Without getting rid of the sixth:

ai-atk-s0403a15:12_3: And here the eighth sections on the eighth day.
ai-atk-s0403a15:14_1: In the ninth sutta, I will teach you about giving and ethical conduct, likewise level in the next life, or conversesing to the next, and converse with them:
ai-atk-s0403a15:14_2: will give him a reason for his (true) meaning.
ai-atk-s0403a15:14_3: for this reason is what is said:
ai-atk-s0403a15:14_4: (Asoka said): “I shall go from a great nourishment,” “I will out of compassion for the mindful workers;”
ai-atk-s0403a15:14_5: There is no limit on material gain for the sake of material gain, nor for the sake of material gain, on material benefits, and without (the next life).
ai-atk-s0403a15:14_6: And without hurting oneself or another, they continue to exercise themselves and put others down on account of that.
